guide.introduction_rendered:
This was one of the first circuits that got me into making. It's very simple and can be used to amplify audio output (mp3 player, computer, etc.) as well as electric guitars.

Relevant parts
  • LM386 audio op-amp
  • Wire
  • 9 Volt alkaline battery
  • 9 volt battery snap connector
  • 220uF/35V capacitor
  • .047uF 100v capacitor
  • 10 Ohm, 1/8 Watt resistor
  • Mono 1/4" Phone Jack (female)
Tools
  • Dremel tool with cutting, grinding, or routing bits
  • Hot Glue gun & hot glue
  • Lighter, long-handled
  • Needle Nose Pliers
  • Soldering iron
  • Super glue
  • Wire cutter/stripper
  • X-Acto knife
